101.reason: We couldn't find an account associated with that zID.
101.title: No Account Exists

202.reason: The password you have chosen does not meet the minimum safety requirements. Please ensure your password meets our criteria!
202.title: Weak Password

100.title: Incorrect Password
100.reason: Your password is incorrect. Please make sure you typed it in correctly.

203.reason: Passwords inputted do not match. Please ensure you type it in carefully.

201.reason: This isn't a valid zID. A zID is an 8-character string that consists of a 'z' followed by a 7-digit code.
201.title: Invalid zID

200.reason: There is already an account associated with this zID. Please sign in instead, or create an account with a different zID.
200.title: Existing User

900.reason: To access this page, you must be signed in!
900.title: Not Signed In
